fullText: The three actors — Ian Shaw, Colin Donnell and Alex Brightman — deliver committed performances in this backstage comedy about the making of 'Jaws,' but the play itself feels as mechanically troubled as the famous malfunctioning shark.
dtliExcerpt: The three actors — Ian Shaw, Colin Donnell and Alex Brightman — deliver committed performances in this backstage comedy about the making of 'Jaws,' but the play itself feels as mechanically troubled as the famous malfunctioning shark.
